                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Designli has consistently exceeded client expectations, showcasing exceptional project management and technical execution. Clients praised their responsiveness and thoroughness, noting significant improvements in user experience and system performance. For instance, one client highlighted the reduction of page load times from 20 seconds to under 2 seconds and a 300% increase in sales after Designli&#39;s intervention. Their commitment to understanding client needs and delivering high-quality solutions has been a recurring theme in positive feedback.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="45157"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="170769"
          data-gtm_insight_id="731663"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web & App Development for Education Platform Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Dec 7, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Designli has <b>exceeded our expectations</b>; our project is complex, and we came to them with a lot of ideas, but they’ve been able to understand our needs and are building a fantastic design with an organized and user-friendly interface.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/designli/170769"
            title="View Designli Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express a strong sentiment of teamwork when working with Matrix Media Solutions (P) Ltd., emphasizing their professionalism and responsiveness. One client highlighted how the team, particularly Pritam and Abhishek, actively collaborated on monetization strategies, demonstrating ownership of the project. The client noted, &#39;I truly feel like we’re a team now,&#39; reflecting an effective partnership. Overall, feedback indicates that Matrix Media fosters a collaborative environment, ensuring that clients feel involved and valued throughout the development process.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="944957"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="228290"
          data-gtm_insight_id="978640"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Development for Mediation & Training Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 25, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Moreover, they’re friendly and take ownership of my app, showing me that they understand their responsibilities. Pritam is a great team leader. <b>He coordinates everything</b>. When I send an email, <b>he always gets back to me through Zoom, Google Meet, and chats</b>. Moreover, the team is realistic in terms of timelines — <b>they’ve managed my expectations well</b>. We’re moving in the right direction at a good pace. They keep showing me signs of their work and tell me whenever they have a holiday. Overall, everything is well-coordinated and managed.
            </p>
          </div>

One client noted the founder&#39;s strong background in banking and consulting, which facilitated effective stakeholder management and streamlined communication. Overall, client sentiment reflects a high level of satisfaction with Radity&#39;s efficient approach.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Wve Labs consistently exceeds client expectations, as evidenced by multiple reviews. One client highlighted their exceptional design quality and responsiveness, stating, &#34;The app&#39;s quality and the vendor&#39;s delivery speed exceeded my expectations.&#34; Another client praised their project management, noting, &#34;They’ve met every milestone on time, if not early.&#34; Overall, clients commend Wve Labs for their professionalism, transparency, and ability to deliver outstanding products, making them a commendable choice for future projects.
      </p>
    </div>

                    title="Read Full Review on MindSea"

            >MindSea is a Mobile App Development company specializing in iOS and Android development. Their reviews on Clutch.co indicate a strong reputation for effective project management and excellent communication, with 100% of reviewers highlighting their professionalism and integrity. Clients praise MindSea for seamlessly integrating with teams and delivering high-quality products on time and within budget, although some mention cost and resource estimation as areas for improvement.

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="28474"
              data-gtm_insight_id="715155"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Team players
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        MindSea is consistently praised for their team-oriented approach, with clients noting their collaborative and consultative style. One client emphasized that MindSea feels like an extension of their own team, highlighting the strong communication and trust established. Another remarked on the rapid response to needs and the integrity displayed by the team. Overall, clients express a sentiment of partnership, indicating that MindSea&#39;s team players greatly enhance project success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="28474"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="294028"
          data-gtm_insight_id="715155"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev & UX/UI Design for Software Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 11, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Mindsea worked with me to come up with a more cost effective way to handle project management. I have background in coding and working with development teams on project prioritization so we decided to share the project management responsibilities over having a dedicated project manager. This led to a development process that was faster, more cost effective and cut out much of the misinterpretation that can come with having a middle person between the client and the people doing the actual work. <b>We are like a bullet train working together</b>, however, I will say that our working relationship relies on two way trust which we built quickly and with solid communication.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/mindsea/294028"
            title="View MindSea Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="28474"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="294028"
            data-gtm_insight_id="715155"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="28474"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="46894"
          data-gtm_insight_id="715155"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">App Development for News Provider</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 20, 2015</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              MindSea almost acts as an extension of my own team. <b>They're extremely consultative and collaborative</b>. It's not a factory. They operate the way I need them to. In other words if I say to them what we want to do, they're not just going to do it. They're going to think about it, provide their expertise, and come back to me if they think that there's a way to make it better.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"

Across various reviews, 100% of clients praised their responsive project management and technical skills, highlighting their ability to deliver on time and adapt to client needs efficiently. Although some clients noted areas for improvement in initial project planning and documentation, the overall feedback is overwhelmingly positive, with clients reporting increased user engagement and satisfaction post-collaboration.

        Clients consistently praise Teksmobile&#39;s openness and flexibility throughout the development process.                         Show More
                    </button>
                </div>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="65741"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1916599"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Puts the customer first
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Puts the customer first
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Coobers demonstrates a strong customer-first approach, as evidenced by their flexibility in accommodating changes from the end-client without additional costs. Clients appreciate their commitment to meeting deadlines, even under challenging circumstances. One client highlighted Coobers&#39; proactive attitude in suggesting next steps, which added significant value to the project. Overall, the sentiment is highly positive, with clients noting that Coobers consistently surpasses expectations and effectively prioritizes customer needs.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="65741"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="81122"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1916599"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Android porting for Finacial Services iOS App</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 24, 2016</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They were flexible because they worked with us despite the fact that our end-client didn’t respect the stipulations that we had agreed to at the start, like furnishing everything to port the iOS application. Some parts of the system have been redeveloped slightly by Coobers and without any additional cost. <b>They are, generally speaking, always on time. When they say they will deliver by a date, they always meet the deadline, even if they have to work over the weekend.</b>
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Busy Human for exceeding their expectations, particularly in delivering impressive results. One client noted they aimed for 200 interactions but received 850, highlighting exceptional outcomes. The company&#39;s communication and responsiveness were frequently commended, with one reviewer stating, &#39;Busy Human is by far the best in the way they communicate.&#39; Their expertise and proactive approach were also recognized, with clients expressing trust in their capabilities against larger competitors.
      </p>
    </div>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Web &amp; Mobile App Dev for Robotic Vending Machines Company
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  Memory Squared has developed a mobile app for iOS and Android for a robotic vending machines company using Java. The team is currently developing a web app and optimizing the client’s website.
        
        <a
          target="_blank"
          href="/go-to-review/memory-squared/337527"

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="257622"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1251276"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed that Flying Dynamite, particularly through CEO Marcin Drozdowski, consistently exceeds expectations by delivering high-quality, engaging content that significantly enhances social media presence. One client reported gaining a thousand new followers and numerous leads due to the effective texts provided. The responsiveness and punctuality of the team were also highlighted as key strengths, with clients noting the impressive impact on their online engagement and overall satisfaction with the collaboration.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="257622"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="43941"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1251276"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Social Media Content for UX Design Agency</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 22, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The quality of texts was always on the top, the content being substantial and involving the audience to comments and reactions. Many times, it happened that someone asked me: "Who's managing your social media? Your profile is awesome!", so I got the confirmation that the effect visible on my and my company profile <b>was the one I expected and even more than I expected</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/flying-dynamite/43941"
            title="View Flying Dynamite Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="257622"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="43941"
            data-gtm_insight_id="1251276"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
      </ul>
    </div>

    <a
      target="_blank"
      href="/profile/flying-dynamite#reviews"
      title="View Flying Dynamite Reviews"
      class="provider__cta-link provider-insight__cta-link provider-insight__cta-link--reviews-mention sg-button-v2 sg-button-v2--secondary"
      aria-label="View Flying Dynamite Reviews"

      data-gtm_provider_id="257622"

            >Appinventiv is a mobile application development company specializing in iOS and Android platforms. They have received a mix of both positive and negative feedback, with approximately 70% of the reviews praising their technical proficiency, project management, and commitment to quality. However, around 30% of reviews reflect concerns about communication and delivery issues. Many clients commend their problem-solving abilities and adaptability.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Appinventiv is consistently recognized as a collaborative partner, with clients noting their strong commitment and integration into project teams. One client highlighted their impressive interaction, stating that Appinventiv solicits feedback and incorporates it effectively, fostering a solid partnership. Another client emphasized their engagement, describing the team as integral to their development process and expressing appreciation for their willingness to provide suggestions beyond the project scope. Overall, the sentiment reflects a positive perception of Appinventiv as team players.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="46159"
          data-gtm_insight_id="711528"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">App Development for Online Training & Coaching Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 16, 2019</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The way they <b>interact with our entire team is impressive</b>. They <b>solicit feedback on their inputs</b> and then <b>incorporate our comments to continue iterating</b>. It’s helped us build up a good partnership and mutual understanding with them.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 28, 2019</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They have a really impressive <b>commitment to our business</b>. They really <b>care about what we’re doing</b>, and I really <b>treat them as part of our dev team</b>. I’ve visited them in India and spent a week working with them in person to develop that relationship, and they <b>feel very comfortable giving us feedback and suggestions</b> outside of the direct scope of what we ask them to do.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients perceive Grey Chain as exemplary team players, highlighting their collaborative approach and dedication to project success. One client noted their involvement across various project stages, emphasizing the team&#39;s agile methodology and proactive risk management. The feedback underscores the team&#39;s commitment to partnership, with one client stating they &#39;truly partner with us&#39; and exhibit &#39;efforts and behaviors far beyond the committed work stack.&#39; Overall, sentiment towards Grey Chain&#39;s teamwork is overwhelmingly positive.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="181039"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="10475"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1877104"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">IT Consulting & SI for Publishing Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 7, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The team operates in complete agile fashion. There is a two-week sprint cycle having clear milestones and deliverables. The team has also laid down a steering committee structure <b>which includes senior members from Grey Chain team to provide regular updates</b> which include milestone plan, risk awareness, resource plan etc. <b>They truly partner with us like it is their product</b> and they ensure successful delivery by exhibiting efforts and behaviors far beyond the committed work stack.
            </p>
          </div>

        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1898812"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1963291"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Team players
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback highlights Mitigate&#39;s strong collaboration and team-oriented approach. The project manager noted that Mitigate acted as a &#39;fully entitled technology partner,&#39; actively engaging throughout the project lifecycle. They emphasized the numerous brainstorming sessions held via Microsoft Teams and appreciated the project&#39;s timely completion. Overall, the sentiment reflects high satisfaction with Mitigate&#39;s team dynamics, showcasing their commitment to partnership and effective communication.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1898812"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="175093"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1963291"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Dev for Outdoor Advertising Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 9, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Mitigate is not a mere supplier, but rather a fully entitled technology partner. <b>They provide their support during the full project cycle</b> - starting with the inception phase and doing the research to implementing a fully operational solution.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/mitigate/175093"
            title="View Mitigate Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="1898812"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="175093"
            data-gtm_insight_id="1963291"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
      </ul>

Another client emphasized how Mooncascade&#39;s proactive nature made them feel like part of the internal team, highlighting their ability to raise issues and suggest improvements across the system.     <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1172147"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1005060"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Techne consistently exceeds client expectations, as highlighted by a founder who noted that the final app not only matched but surpassed the initial design and brief. Another client praised the team&#39;s ability to elevate a simple idea into a polished app, stating they received far beyond what was anticipated. Overall, clients commend the exceptional communication, professionalism, and responsiveness throughout the project, leading to a sentiment of high satisfaction and strong recommendations.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

          class="provider-insight__review"

          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently describe Five Pack as effective team players who integrate seamlessly into their projects. One client noted that Five Pack &#39;felt like they were on our team&#39; and demonstrated a commitment to understanding their business needs. Another emphasized the &#39;team collaboration&#39; and the ability to work as business partners rather than a traditional supplier-client relationship. Overall, the feedback reflects a strong sentiment of partnership and responsiveness, with only minor concerns regarding communication towards the project&#39;s end.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

          class="provider-insight__review"

            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Development Services for Social Media Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 17, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The entire Five Pack team we have engaged with have been <b>extremely responsive throughout the project</b>. Very high aptitude for Project Management, able to keep things on track, push back on things we may not have needed and suggest alternatives and conducts themselves in a very professional manner. <b>Their ability as a team to connect with us right from the start</b> and work as if they were part of our own company.
            </p>

One client highlighted their ability to deliver a production-level software solution in just three months, showcasing exceptional responsiveness to evolving project needs. Overall, clients express high satisfaction with the team&#39;s dedication and performance, noting no areas for improvement.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently report that New Digital Street exceeds expectations in their project delivery and communication. One CEO highlighted their professionalism and ability to build effective software development teams under tight deadlines, stating they were impressed by NDS&#39;s willingness to invest in client relationships even before contracts were signed. Another client noted that NDS transformed their e-commerce platform into a primary revenue source, emphasizing high-level communication and responsiveness throughout the project. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction and admiration for NDS&#39;s commitment and expertise.
      </p>

<li class="provider-list-item" id="provider-2258101" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/ListItem">
  

































    







    






    

    

    

    

    



<meta itemprop="position" content="16">

<div
    class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed provider-row--non-ppc "
    data-is-list="true"
    data-clutch-pid="2258101"
    data-title="HOMIN"

    
        data-position="816"
        data-type="Directory"
    
    
    itemprop="item"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Establish clear expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The reviews highlight that Madcraft excels in establishing clear expectations with clients. One client noted the organized project management, including monthly performance summaries, which helped align goals and monitor progress. Another emphasized the proactive consultations that clarified their branding objectives. Overall, the sentiment is highly positive, with clients expressing satisfaction in communication and deliverables, indicating a strong foundation for collaboration.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          data-gtm_insight_id="1803140"

          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Branding & Digital Marketing for Office Equipment Supplier</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">

              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 21, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They’re organized to the point of providing us with a monthly summary report of our performance and web store conversions. <b>From there, we put together our thoughts on where we want to go from there</b>. From a project management perspective, <b>they meet all our expectations</b>.
            </p>

Another client emphasized Fifth Beat&#39;s initiative in creating processes and organizing meetings to enhance communication. Their ability to adapt and fulfill project milestones was also praised, demonstrating a commitment to client success and effective collaboration.

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Puts the customer first
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Corner Case Technologies consistently demonstrates a customer-first approach, as highlighted by clients who appreciated their commitment to understanding business needs and providing tailored solutions. One CEO emphasized their impressive ability to align with strict development timelines and respond effectively to feedback. Another client noted the team&#39;s willingness to go the extra mile to ensure satisfaction. Overall, sentiment reflects a strong dedication to client success, with suggestions for enhanced support services.
      </p>

            </div>

Team was always interested in the business core concepts, processes and problems, they were trying to understand before development, always looking for the best approach and the best possible solution for every single functionality.

        InStandart has received positive feedback for their customized support, particularly in creating bespoke Shopware themes and plugins tailored to client specifications. Clients noted the company&#39;s personalized service, which included regular updates and prompt integration of feedback. One client emphasized the impressive end-to-end solutions offered, highlighting the importance of customization in meeting specific business needs. Overall, the sentiment surrounding their customized support is highly favorable, with clients appreciating the attention to detail and effective communication throughout the project.

            <button

            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Personable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Future Forward for their personable approach and effective communication. One CEO highlighted their &#39;personal touch and way of communicating&#39; as particularly impressive. Additionally, clients noted the team&#39;s availability, responsiveness, and quick resolution of issues, contributing to a positive collaborative experience. Overall, the sentiment regarding Future Forward&#39;s personable nature is overwhelmingly positive, indicating that they build strong relationships with their clients.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"

            <button

            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        AESTAR has consistently exceeded client expectations, demonstrating exceptional quality and attention to detail in their work. One client noted that the team&#39;s ability to deliver exactly what was required led to outcomes that surpassed their initial goals. Another highlighted their consistent on-time project delivery and proactive support, which facilitated successful project planning. Overall, AESTAR is recognized for their professionalism, expertise, and commitment to client satisfaction, making them a highly recommended partner.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="2113600"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="289364"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1627958"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Web Dev & Design for Retail Technology Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 17, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              At every milestone, the team presented us with a visualisation of what the completed task would look like. This ensured that the team were not only able to deliver exactly what we required but <b>exceeded expectations</b>. Their team was extremely responsive to our needs. Any question we had were handled with great thought and consideration in mind.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/aestar/289364"
            title="View AESTAR Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"

            >NG Logic is a Mobile App Development company that specializes in creating Android applications with seamless integration with web platforms. <section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed high satisfaction with Softellar&#39;s team players, highlighting their seamless integration into existing teams and adaptability to project needs. One client noted that Softellar&#39;s developers were &#39;crucial members&#39; of their team, significantly accelerating development and enhancing code quality. The overall sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Softellar&#39;s commitment, responsiveness, and collaborative spirit, with no reported areas for improvement.
      </p>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Custom Software Development for Car Maintenance Platform
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  Sensi Labs redesigned the structure of a car maintenance platform to enhance its responsiveness, performance, and scalability.
        
        <a

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Establish clear expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have noted that Exaud excels in communication and project management, even when initial project scopes are vague. A client remarked on the importance of aligning costs with a general budget, highlighting Exaud&#39;s proactive approach in developing estimates. However, feedback suggests that clearer identification of risk factors could enhance efficiency in addressing issues. Overall, the sentiment indicates a strong commitment to establishing clear expectations, contributing positively to project outcomes.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_insight_id="1245086"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Web App Dev & Maintenance for Construction Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 19, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Exaud resources have been excellent communicators. The project scope was very vague to begin with, but <b>Exaud developed a general budget estimate anyway</b>. We were able to work together to align cost with the general budget.
            </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Establish clear expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed positive sentiments regarding WASKO S.A.&#39;s ability to establish clear expectations and communicate effectively throughout projects. One client noted that WASKO&#39;s team quickly understood project requirements without needing extensive explanations. Another highlighted the importance of face-to-face meetings for clearer communication. Overall, clients appreciate the proactive approach to project management and the absence of major issues, indicating a strong alignment in expectations and delivery.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1120788"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="135950"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1390463"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Network Configuration Support for Phone Network Provider</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 80%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 10, 2020</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They operate very smoothly and we quickly found a common language. Despite a complex network, <b>they explained how it works and the topics that should be touched upon</b>. The people we work with are skilled and responsible, and the collaboration with them is going smoothly. We don’t use any project management tools, but we have phone calls once a week and meetings once a year where we discuss what we’ve achieved and how our tools should be developed.
            </p>
          </div>

            target="_blank"

    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that company’s size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a company’s specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

%20Denver-based%20video%20production%20and%20animation%20company%20known%20for%20blending%20creativity%20with%20strategic%20insight.%20They%20specialize%20in%20crafting%20videos%20that%20fit%20seamlessly%20into%20broader%20marketing%20campaigns,%20focusing%20on%20maximizing%20client%20ROI%20and%20engagement.%20With%20expertise%20spanning%20directing,%20cinematography,%20editing,%20and%20animation,%20the%20Snowy%20Peak%20team%20collaborates%20closely%20with%20clients%20to%20ensure%20each%20project%20aligns%20with%20their%20vision%20and%20brand.%3C/li%3E%0A%3C/ol%3E%0A%0A%3Ch3%3ESelection%20Criteria:%20Popular%202D%20Animation%20Agencies%3C/h3%3E%0A%0AClutch%20makes%20it%20easy%20to%20find%20and%20connect%20with%20the%20best%202D%20animation%20companies%20in%20the%20world.%20The%20Clutch%20Leaders%20Matrix%20provides%20a%20broad%20view%20of%20top%202D%20animation%20agencies,%20each%20company%20featured%20is%20evaluated%20on%20specific%20criteria.%20This%20robust%20criteria%20includes%20Area%20of%20Focus%20and%20Ability%20to%20Deliver.%20Area%20of%20Focus%20accounts%20for%20a%20company%E2%80%99s%20specialization%20within%20a%20certain%20service.%20Ability%20to%20Deliver%20includes%20client%20reviews,%20past%20projects,%20market%20presence%20and%20reputation%20in%20the%20industry.%20Each%202D%20animation%20firm%20must%20provide%20evidence%20of%20successfully%20completed%20projects%20for%20previous%20clients,%20validating%20the%20project%20occurred%20and%20the%20details%20of%20the%20engagement%20are%20valid.&nbsp;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAppearances%20in%20the%20Leaders%20Matrix%20are%20not%20paid%20placements;%20companies%20cannot%20pay%20to%20be%20included.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ENote:%20This%20list%20was%20last%20updated%20on%20November%2026,%202024.%3C/div%3E"}]},{"p":"^\\/agencies\\/digital-design$","m":[{"id":"2kza5oe-m432sgnt","s":".directory-header__description-text","m":0,"ce":"Digital%20design%20has%20been%20the%20backbone%20of%20the%20online%20world!%20Agencies%20that%20offer%
